Headline: Temporary Reroute
ShortDescription: #71 buses are rerouted in both directions via Torrance, 100th, and Commercial.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?
Buses are rerouted in both directions via Torrance, 100th, and Commercial. 

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?
Buses are rerouted due to utility maintenance at Commercial/103rd.

Headline: Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are running, but with extended wait times. Some riders may experience wait times of up to 30 minute. Allow extra travel time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are running, but with extended wait times. Some riders may experience wait times of up to 30 minutes while our crews work to restore regular service levels.

Use trackers to look for live arrival information and consider available alternatives, such a local bus routes or buses to/from other 'L' lines.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #55 Garfield Temporary Westbound Reroute near Garfield/King Drive
ShortDescription: Westbound #55 Garfield buses are temporarily rerouted via 55th, Indiana, 53rd, Michigan and 55th, due to fire department activity near Garfield/King Drive.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #55 Garfield buses are temporarily rerouted via 55th, Indiana, 53rd, Michigan and 55th, then resume their normal route, due to fire department activity near Garfield/King Drive.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
